welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Skiatook, known for its rich history and breathtaking scenery. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tulsa International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Tulsa International Airport primarily serves domestic flights operated by American Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Tulsa International Airport primarily serves domestic flights operated by Delta Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Tulsa International Airport serves domestic flights operated by Southwest Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Network name may vary.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at R.Lloyd Jones Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at R.Lloyd Jones Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing exclusive services and facilities for a luxurious travel experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bartlesville Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
